Trade/Device Name(s): Healgen Strep A Rapid Test Strip (Throat Swab)
Strep A Rapid Test Strip (Throat Swab)
Analyte(s): Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A β-hemolytic Streptococcus, Strep A) antigen
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Healgen Strep A Rapid Test Strip (Throat Swab), a lateral flow immunoassay for qualitative detection of Group A Streptococcus antigen in throat swab specimens
Indications for Use Summary: A rapid chromatographic immunoassay for qualitative detection of Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A β-hemolytic Streptococcus, Strep A) antigen from throat swab specimens of symptomatic patients to aid in diagnosis of Group A Streptococcus bacterial infection; negative results should be confirmed by bacterial culture.
